title: Phase 3: Travel
content:
After all Rangers have rested, you may decide as a group if you’d like to travel.

Each location card has a progress threshold on the right-hand side of the card. If the card has a number of progress tokens equal to or greater than that threshold, you can choose to travel.

Note: Ready cards with the obstacle keyword prevent you from traveling. You must either clear these cards, exhaust them, or deal with them some other way before you can travel.
